about_the_game:
In Venator Universe, to survive, you must see everyone as a threat while making new friends and watching your back. You need to explore more planets, find more minerals, and earn more. Later, you should go to the space station and trade. This way, you can dominate the server. With a building system featuring nearly 30 parts

With 250 crafting materials, you can either dive into weapon production or dominate the server’s potion supply. There are plenty of products for every profession here. Craft, sell, upgrade, and grow stronger.

Wouldn't you want to strengthen your home where you store everything? Design it nicely, place things like turrets in strategic spots, or use more primitive creations to make your enemies suffer.

With over 200 types of minerals you can gather, become more diverse, stronger, and unique. It's all in your hands. Travel, explore, overcome dangers, and acquire them.

Not just trees and crystals. Of course, you can also discover minerals, food, or surprise ancient items from the soil. Keep your eyes open—every place is equally rich in resources.

Fishing is a trade source on its own. Eat and boost your basic resources, cook and sell meals, dry them and prepare special mixtures, or hope for a relic to appear on the end of your line. The choice is yours. Define your playstyle.

To survive, you need to crush your rivals. Everyone is an enemy, so craft your melee or ranged weapon. Remember, all of them are upgradeable items. Be patient and try upgrading.

Now, take the loot you’ve gathered or stolen from someone else and quickly bring it to the space station. There, you can sell it at a good price, and maybe find something even better through bargaining. Or, you can wait for the black market that appears at night. You can try your luck for many items that aren't produced in the game.
detailed_description:
In Venator Universe, to survive, you must see everyone as a threat while making new friends and watching your back. You need to explore more planets, find more minerals, and earn more. Later, you should go to the space station and trade. This way, you can dominate the server. With a building system featuring nearly 30 parts

With 250 crafting materials, you can either dive into weapon production or dominate the server’s potion supply. There are plenty of products for every profession here. Craft, sell, upgrade, and grow stronger.

Wouldn't you want to strengthen your home where you store everything? Design it nicely, place things like turrets in strategic spots, or use more primitive creations to make your enemies suffer.

With over 200 types of minerals you can gather, become more diverse, stronger, and unique. It's all in your hands. Travel, explore, overcome dangers, and acquire them.

Not just trees and crystals. Of course, you can also discover minerals, food, or surprise ancient items from the soil. Keep your eyes open—every place is equally rich in resources.

Fishing is a trade source on its own. Eat and boost your basic resources, cook and sell meals, dry them and prepare special mixtures, or hope for a relic to appear on the end of your line. The choice is yours. Define your playstyle.

To survive, you need to crush your rivals. Everyone is an enemy, so craft your melee or ranged weapon. Remember, all of them are upgradeable items. Be patient and try upgrading.

Now, take the loot you’ve gathered or stolen from someone else and quickly bring it to the space station. There, you can sell it at a good price, and maybe find something even better through bargaining. Or, you can wait for the black market that appears at night. You can try your luck for many items that aren't produced in the game.

name: Venator Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: İ3 12100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Rtx 2050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5 12400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Rtx 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Venator Universe is a sci-fi RPG survival game developed by VenatorGames. It aims to create a highly action-packed and hostile environment. The goal of the game is to survive, which requires players to gather resources, craft items, and improve themselves.
